Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.i18n

Class LocalizerFactory

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.i18n.LocalizerFactory
public final class LocalizerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a set of static methods to manipulate with the localizers.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
Localizer, LocaleResource, LocaleResourceLocation, LocaleSpecificTextSetter
LastUpdate:
0.0.4

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  LocalizerFactory.FillLocalizedContentCallback<T>
    This lambda-styled interface describes callback for storing localized data thru LocaleSpecificTextSetter interface.
    static interface  LocalizerFactory.PostProcessCallback<T>
    This lambda-styled interface describes callback for special processing of the data localized before assign the value to any target (for example, make automatic upper case for localization strings).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Fill the fields in the object instance with the localized content

  • Method Details

    • hasLocalizerFor

      public static boolean hasLocalizerFor​(java.net.URI localizerUri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Test existence of localizer for the given URI

      Parameters:
      localizerUri - localizer URI to test
      Returns:
      true if appropriative localized is accessible, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if localizerUri is null
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • getLocalizer

      public static Localizer getLocalizer​(java.net.URI localizerUri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, LocalizationException

      Get localizer for the given localizer URI. Any localizers were registered thru SPI can be used. SPI service name is the name of Localizer class

      Parameters:
      localizerUri - resource to get localizer for. Must be any URI with the Localizer.LOCALIZER_SCHEME scheme
      Returns:
      localizer built
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when localizer URI is null
      LocalizationException - if any I/O errors were detected during getting localizer

    • buildLocalizerForInstance

      public static Localizer buildLocalizerForInstance​(java.lang.Object instance) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException, LocalizationException

      Build localizer instance for the given object instance. Object instance must be annotated with both LocaleResourceLocation and LocaleResource annotations (see annotation descriptions).

      Parameters:
      instance - object instance to build localizer for
      Returns:
      localizer build or null if no any items were marked by LocaleResource annotations
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if object instance was null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when any errors in the annotations were detected
      java.io.IOException - when any I/O errors were detected on localizer building
      LocalizationException - when any errors in the annotations were detected
      LastUpdate:
      0.0.3

    • fillLocalizedContent

      public static <T> void fillLocalizedContent​(Localizer fillFrom, T instance) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException, LocalizationException

      Fill the fields in the object instance with the localized content

      Type Parameters:
      T - any sort of the class marked with the localization annotations (LocaleResource, LocaleResourceLocation)
      Parameters:
      fillFrom - localizer to fill content from
      instance - object instance to fill it's fields (see buildLocalizerForInstance(Object))
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameters are null
      java.io.IOException - when I/O exception was detected
      LocalizationException - when localization exception was detected

    • fillLocalizedContent

      public static <T> void fillLocalizedContent​(Localizer fillFrom, T instance, LocalizerFactory.PostProcessCallback<T> postprocess) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException, LocalizationException

      Fill the fields in the object instance with the localized content

      Type Parameters:
      T - any sort of the class marked with the localization annotations (LocaleResource, LocaleResourceLocation)
      Parameters:
      fillFrom - localizer to fill content from
      instance - object instance to fill it's fields (see buildLocalizerForInstance(Object))
      postprocess - postporocess callback
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameters are null
      java.io.IOException - when I/O exception was detected
      LocalizationException - when localization exception was detected

    • fillLocalizedContent

      public static <T> void fillLocalizedContent​(Localizer fillFrom, T instance, LocalizerFactory.FillLocalizedContentCallback<T> callback) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException, LocalizationException

      Fill the fields in the object instance with the localized content

      Type Parameters:
      T - any sort of the class marked with the localization annotations (LocaleResource, LocaleResourceLocation)
      Parameters:
      fillFrom - localizer to fill content from
      instance - object instance to fill it's fields (see buildLocalizerForInstance(Object))
      callback - filling LocaleSpecificTextSetter callback
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameters are null
      java.io.IOException - when I/O exception was detected
      LocalizationException - when localization exception was detected

    • fillLocalizedContent

      public static <T> void fillLocalizedContent​(Localizer fillFrom, T instance, LocalizerFactory.FillLocalizedContentCallback<T> callback, LocalizerFactory.PostProcessCallback<T> postprocess) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException, LocalizationException

      Fill the fields in the object instance with the localized content

      Type Parameters:
      T - any sort of the class marked with the localization annotations (LocaleResource, LocaleResourceLocation)
      Parameters:
      fillFrom - localizer to fill content from
      instance - object instance to fill it's fields (see buildLocalizerForInstance(Object))
      callback - filling LocaleSpecificTextSetter callback
      postprocess - post-process callback
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameters are null
      java.io.IOException - when I/O exception was detected
      LocalizationException - when localization exception was detected
      LastUpdate:
      0.0.3
